verbs.description: [V: Stop] [ARG1: scratching it] … if you keep repeating it it only makes the lie worse . Misconduct happens nearly daily , but disinformation and misinformation are n’t perjury or obstruction … yet . Russia was clearly on the FBI ’s collective mind when Trump fired ...
